properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 9:51PM CST until January 11 at 4:00AM CST by NWS Wichita KS
properties.description:
...Winter Weather to impact the area early morning Saturday...

* WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected.
Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as
high as 35 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed
precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch
and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high
as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Marion County.

* WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 4 AM to 6 PM CST
Saturday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 4 AM CST
Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rapidly dropping temperatures are creating
flash freezing conditions causing any roads that are wet to ice.
Be aware of these conditions as they will create very slick road
conditions.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM CST SATURDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 6 PM CST SATURDAY
